title: Speaker with Cancellation Stroke

adjectives: Free from sound or noise; absolutely still; perfectly quiet.
Marked by the complete lack of sound or noise.
verbs: Cause to be quiet or not talk
To become quiet; to cease making sounds.
To cause to be quiet or not talk.
To make someone or something become quieter.
Deaden (a sound or noise), especially by wrapping
To mute or deaden (a sound etc.).
To turn off the sound of.
nouns: An electromechanical device which produces sound
Device which transforms electrical signals into acoustical signals.
Transducer that converts electrical energy into sound energy
A loudspeaker is an electroacoustic transducer; a device which converts an electrical audio signal into a corresponding sound.
Electro-acoustic transducer that converts electrical signals into sounds loud enough to be heard at a distance
An electromechanical transducer that converts an electrical signal into audible sound.
A relative or total lack of sound
Lack of audible sound or presence of sounds of very low intensity
The complete lack of sound or noise.
Silence is the lack of audible sound or presence of sounds of very low intensity.

description: A speaker with a red line through it, indicating muted volume or silencing of audio.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's muted speaker emoji presents a sleek, minimalist speaker grille in a deep charcoal gray, accented by a prominent red circle with a diagonal line, signaling silence.  Its design on Apple devices features a subtle 3D effect with soft gradients and gentle reflections, making it appear both modern and functional.  This emoji is ideal for indicating a desire for quiet, a muted notification setting, or a lack of sound on Apple devices.
